name: Loïc Guégan
content: Guégan, Loïc | UiT Loic.guegan – Institutt for informatikk | UiT Gå til hovedinnhold Enheten Ansatte Loïc Guégan Førsteamanuensis Institutt for informatikk loic.guegan@uit.no +4777646341 Tromsø Her finner du meg Loïc Guégan Om Forskning og undervisning Her finner du meg Stillingsbeskrivelse I am working on the development of energy efficient CPS as part of the Distributed Arctic Observatory (DAO) project. I am also contributing to a simulator for distributed system. Arbeider i Cristin Vitenskapelige artikler og bokkapitler Andre Loïc Guégan, Issam Rais, Otto Johan Anshus : A large-scale study of the impact of node behavior on loosely coupled data dissemination: The case of the distributed Arctic observatory Journal of Parallel and Distributed Computing 2024 DOI / ARKIV Loïc Guégan, Issam Rais : Simulation of Distributed Systems in Constrained Environments Using ESDS: the Arctic Tundra Case 2023 DOI Loic Guegan, Issam Rais, Otto Johan Anshus : Towards Data Dissemination Policy Prediction for Constrained Environments Using Analytics 2023 DOI / ARKIV Loic Guegan, Issam Rais, Otto Johan Anshus : Validation of ESDS Using Epidemic-Based Data Dissemination Algorithms 2023 DOI / ARKIV Loïc Guégan, Salma Tofaily, Issam Rais : Design and Evaluation of Single-Board Computer Based Power Monitoring for IoT and Edge Systems 2023 DOI / ARKIV Lukasz Sergiusz Michalik, Loic Guegan, Issam Rais, Otto Johan Anshus, John Markus Bjørndalen : LoRaLitE: LoRa protocol for Energy-Limited environments 2022 DOI Issam Rais, Loic Guegan, Otto Johan Anshus : Impact of loosely coupled data dissemination policies for resource challenged environments 2022 DOI Loic Guegan, Salma Tofaily, Issam Rais : Design and Evaluation of Single-Board Computer Based Power Monitoring for IoT and Edge Systems 2023 Loic Guegan, Issam Rais, Otto Johan Anshus : Towards Data Dissemination Policy Prediction for Constrained Environments Using Analytics 2023 Loic Guegan, Issam Rais, Otto Johan Anshus : Validation of ESDS Using Epidemic-Based Data Dissemination Algorithms 2023 Lukasz Sergiusz Michalik, Loic Guegan, Issam Rais, Otto Johan Anshus, John Markus Bjørndalen : LoRaLitE: LoRa protocol for Energy-Limited environments 2022 De 50 siste resultatene fra Cristin vises på siden.
